00063 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00064 
00071 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00072 //include protection
00073 #ifndef SHA256_H
00074 #define SHA256_H
00075 
00076 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00077 //lenght defines
00078 #define SHA256_BLOCK_LENGTH             64
00079 #define SHA256_SHORT_BLOCK_LENGTH       (SHA256_BLOCK_LENGTH - 8)
00080 #define SHA256_DIGEST_LENGTH            32
00081 #define SHA256_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH     (SHA256_DIGEST_LENGTH * 2 + 1)
00082 
00083 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00084 //hl includes
00085 #include "hl_types.h"
00086 
00087 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00088 //typedefs
00089 
00093 typedef hl_uint8  sha2_byte;    
00094 
00098 typedef hl_uint32 sha2_word32;  
00099 
00103 typedef hl_uint64 sha2_word64;  
00104 
00108 typedef struct SHA256_CTX 
00109 {
00113         hl_uint32               state[8];
00114 
00118         hl_uint64               bitcount;
00119 
00123         hl_uint8                buffer[SHA256_BLOCK_LENGTH];
00124 } SHA256_CTX;
00125 
00126 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00127 
00137 class SHA256
00138 {
00139         private:
00140 
00141 
00147                 void SHA256_Final(hl_uint8 digest[SHA256_DIGEST_LENGTH],
00148                                   SHA256_CTX* context);
00149 
00155                 void SHA256_Transform(SHA256_CTX* context,
00156                                       const sha2_word32* data);
00157 
00158         public:
00159 
00164                 void SHA256_Init(SHA256_CTX *context);
00165 
00172                 void SHA256_Update(SHA256_CTX* context,
00173                                    const hl_uint8* data,
00174                                    unsigned int len);
00175 
00183                 char* SHA256_End(SHA256_CTX* context,
00184                                  char buffer[SHA256_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH]);
00185 
00186 };
00187 
00188 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00189 //end of include protection
00190 #endif
